channel.title: Hello World! on Anis SAADAOUI
channel.description: Recent content in Hello World! on Anis SAADAOUI

item.title: Project II: Sentiment analysis from Facebook comments
item.description: -Sentiment Analysis of STB bank customers from Facebook comments -Extracting data from social networks. -Translation of messages using the Google translate API and a dictionary as well as conversion to Arabic language (deromanization) -Displaying the values of customers' feelings in relation to several axes (product, location). Tools and technologies: NLP,nltk,fastext,spacy,Vadersentiment,selenuim,beautifulsoup,PowerBi Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project I: Flask_Credit_Monitoring
item.description: -The application is based on the automation of the process of entering and processing financial statements within a bank specifically. -Development of a recognition engine(OCR) to automatically and intelligently extract the data present in the financial statements. -Improvement of the quality of the extracted data. -Development of a credit scoring engine using the data. -Restitution of interactive dashboards for decision making. Tools and technologies: machine learning, Flask, Pytesseract, selenuim, beautifulsoup
